For Zion's sake will I not hold my peace— ,These are the words of Jehovah declaring his purpose relative to the events predicted in the preceding chapter.

,

Thou shalt be called by a new name— ,Viz., Christian - or, as in the fourth verse, ,בה חפצי ,chephtsi bah ,, "my delight is in her" - because she has now received that command, "This is my beloved Son, in whom I am well pleased; Hear Him."
